title: Typeface recommendations for CSS @font-face website embedding
content:
Dear fellow Typophile's and experts of all things type,

Please share your recommendations for a typeface that is strikingly similar to United Sans Lt and Md by House Industries. The typeface is to be used with CSS @font-face embedding within a website I am making. I'm sad to say that House doesn't allow @font-face CSS embedding of their typefaces and as such I need a replacement. All insights are greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415225453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/unitedsansreg-medium_5493.png)

Please note the angularity of the letterforms...
author: MarvinMe

comments.content: Foundry Gridnik at fonts.com is available for web.

Hi Nick,

That is a fantastic recommendation! Thank you!!!
